answers.answer: Lol! Awesome to see another happy maman! Sound like we are close! Mine is due on August 4th. Not being induced though. Why are you being induced? Cheers to our babies!!
Oh I'm due the 10th and seeing someone due the 3rd is so exciting.  I'm not far away from my third trimester!!!    EEEEK!

I'm due in August 8. I'm going to talk to my doc in the next few weeks to see if I can also be induced in July (or more like need to be) because of my history faith eclampsia, hellp, and preeclampsia, plus, my son being too big for me at 7 pounds....so, yes, I'm getting excited too...getting closer. I estimate 12-17 more weeks.   :)
Im being induced bc of preeclampsia issues. N yes CHEERS!!
Just wondering what week is considered the first week of the third trimester? I thought it was 28, but another app told me 27. I am currently 27 weeks, due July 19th!!

question: Finally in im third trimester n start seeing dr every two weeks! Due Aug 3 but getting induce July! Come on July 21!
title: No question just happy!
